pkgmetadata.longdescription: # selenoprofiles4Profile-based gene finding pipeline specialized in selenoprotein and selenocysteine machinery.For installation instructions and documentation, visit https://selenoprofiles4.readthedocs.io/.## Bug reportPlease report any bugs at the [github issues page](https://github.com/marco-mariotti/selenoprofiles4/issues).## CitationMariotti M, Guigó R (2010)Selenoprofiles: profile-based scanning of eukaryotic genome sequences for selenoprotein genes.*Bioinformatics. 2010 Nov 1;26(21):2656-63*.Santesmasses D, Mariotti M, Guigó R (2018)Selenoprofiles: A Computational Pipeline for Annotation of Selenoproteins.*Methods Mol Biol. 2018;1661:17-28*.
